pages.text: $(thing)Quazar:$()$(#734608) a very strange, very ugly bunch of molten, interstellar goop. The first time I saw one, it was oozing out of the remains of a meteorite crater. But this is no normal slime. It’s extremely unstable, can combust almost at will, and has some control over the gravity of matter around it...

$(#734608)You’re unlikely to find one of these things by chance. You're better off trying to lure the $(thing)Quazar$() $(#734608)right where you want it. Craft a $(item)Quazar Totem$() $(#734608)and then break it apart over the candles of an $(item)Altar of Summoning.$()

pages.title: Fire from the Skies
pages.text: $(#734608)The Totem is used to divert the course of passing meteors, hopefully bringing a Quazar down with them. Watch your head.$()

$(#734608)If you manage to kill a Quazar and still have all your skin and limbs intact, I'd recommend you scoop out its $(item)Volatile Core$() $(#734608)- that thing’s like a magnet for destructive $(thing)Vis$() $(#734608)to condense around. Extremely valuable if you often need to blow things up...
